query_creator_extraction_properties.tooltip: so we know what properties are available

query_creator_analysis_groups.average:
Average value for a numeric target property.

Non-numeric values will be ignored.
query_creator_analysis_groups.count: Total number of events in a given stream.
query_creator_analysis_groups.count_unique: Number of events with unique values for the target property in a given stream.
query_creator_analysis_groups.extraction:
Return events in the given stream with values for selected properties.

Results can be shown in a table or sent to an email.
query_creator_analysis_groups.funnel:
Return the number of unique actors that meet the criteria defined in each step.

"Actors" could mean users, devices, or any other identifiers.
query_creator_analysis_groups.maximum:
Maximum of all numeric values for a target property.

Non-numeric values will be ignored.
query_creator_analysis_groups.median:
Median of all numeric values for a target property.

Non-numeric values will be ignored.
query_creator_analysis_groups.minimum:
Minimum of all numeric values for a target property.

Non-numeric values will be ignored.
query_creator_analysis_groups.percentile:
Numeric value of a target property for a specified percentile.

Non-numeric values will be ignored.
query_creator_analysis_groups.select_unique: List of unique values found for a target property.
query_creator_analysis_groups.standard_deviation:
Standard deviation of all numeric values for a target property.

Non-numeric values will be ignored.
query_creator_analysis_groups.sum:
Sum of all numeric values for a given property.

Non-numeric values will be ignored.
